This creates a separate token account for each token mint

accounts.name: voter_checkpoints

Stores historical voting power at different slots

accounts.name: system_program
docs: Remaining accounts should be pairs of [NFT token account, NFT metadata account] from the governance collection

accounts.name: voter_checkpoints
docs: Voter's checkpoint history - stores voting power at different slots
Similar to OpenZeppelin's Votes.sol checkpoint system

accounts.name: voter_checkpoints
docs: Voter's checkpoint history - stores voting power at different slots
If not initialized, voter will have 0 voting power

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: Treasury token account holding the tokens

accounts.name: destination_token_account
docs: Destination token account to receive withdrawn tokens

errors.name: VotingPeriodNotEnded
errors.msg: Voting period has not ended yet

errors.name: InvalidMaxVotes
errors.msg: Max votes must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidWithdrawAmount
errors.msg: Withdraw amount must be greater than 0

errors.name: VoterDidNotVoteForWinningAnswer
errors.msg: Voter did not vote for the winning answer

errors.name: AnswerVoteFinalized
errors.msg: Answer vote has already been finalized

errors.name: NoQuestParticipation
errors.msg: Must participate in quest voting to vote on decision

types.name: Checkpoint
docs: Individual checkpoint recording voting power at a specific slot

types.name: VoterCheckpoints
docs: Stores historical checkpoints for a voter
Similar to OpenZeppelin's Votes.sol checkpoint system
